Position map Regression Network ( PRN ).from sentence: In this paper , we propose an end - to - end method called Position map Regression Network ( PRN ) to jointly predict dense alignment and reconstruct 3 D face shape .

UV position map.from sentence: Specifically , we design a UV position map , which is a 2D image recording the 3D coordinates of a complete facial point cloud , and at the same time keeping the semantic meaning at each UV place .

simple encoder - decoder network.from sentence: We then train a simple encoder - decoder network with a weighted loss that focuses more on discriminative region to regress the UV position map from a single 2 D facial image .
